page.title: 08Changes at Holwell J.M.I.
page.content: Mrs Worland has been a school cook at our school for 26 years.She was able to tell us about some of the changes that have happened.We used to have an old canteen which was on the other side of the school field.The children used to have to walk upto it in all kinds of weather.It was a very big building with lots of windows.Part of it was unsafe and had to be knocked down.Part of it was kept to be used as a garage for the school minibus.A new canteen was built on to the school. There used to be outside toilets which got frozen during winter.These were knocked down and replaced with indoor toilets.The infant classes were too small,three of them were knocked into two.Because of this we don't have a class four.We think that the changes to our school have made it a much better place.
